words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; all trans. agree
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H2005 interj. הֵן 'behold, look'; KJV 'behold', ESV 'look', NASB 'look'
H7227 adj.mp רַב 'many, numerous'; KJV 'many', ESV 'many', NASB 'many'
H5971 n.ms construct עַם 'people'; KJV 'the people of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the people of'
H776 def. art. + n.fs אֶרֶץ 'land, earth'; KJV 'the land', ESV 'the land', NASB 'the land'

words.phrase: and you would have them rest
words.source: H7673 Hiphil perf. 2mp of שָׁבַת 'to cease, rest'; KJV 'ye make them rest', ESV 'you are making them rest', NASB 'you would have them cease'
H853 DOM + 3mp suff.; functions as direct object pronoun
H5450 prep. מִן + n.fp + 3mp suff. of סְבָלָה 'burden, forced labor'; KJV 'from their burdens', ESV 'from their burdens', NASB 'from their labors'
